fields.title: Blog App with User Features
fields.description: A full-featured blog application built with Django and React. Includes user authentication, post creation, commenting system, and admin dashboard. Features responsive design and real-time notifications.

fields.title: Mini E-commerce App with Analytics
fields.description: E-commerce platform with product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, and comprehensive analytics dashboard. Built with Django REST Framework and modern frontend technologies.

fields.title: Online Grocery Store with Chat
fields.description: Full-stack grocery store application with real-time chat support, order management, and inventory tracking. Features WebSocket integration for live customer support.

fields.title: Accountability App Prototype
fields.description: Mobile-first web application for goal tracking and accountability partnerships. Features progress tracking, peer connections, and motivational notifications.

fields.title: Building Scalable APIs with Django REST Framework
fields.body: In this post, I'll share my experience building scalable APIs using Django REST Framework. We'll cover best practices for serialization, authentication, and performance optimization...

fields.title: My Journey Learning FastAPI
fields.body: FastAPI has been an exciting addition to my Python toolkit. Here's what I've learned about building high-performance APIs with automatic documentation and type hints...

fields.title: Reflections on AI Integration in Web Development
fields.body: As I explore AI integrations in my projects, I've been thinking about the balance between automation and human creativity in web development...
